Class LeaderBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • LeaderBoard

  • public class LeaderBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is responsible for retrieving the scores from each UserProfile and constructing a descending leaderboard.
    Creation Date: 19/11/2019
    Last Modified Date: 08/12/2019
    Version:
    1.7
    Author:
    Joseff Pugh (975656), Nihal Goindi (976005), Timothy Roger (977422)

        Method to create the leaderboard for a certain level.
        Parameters:
        profileList - ArrayList of existing UserProfiles
        level - the level of which the user scores will be compared to
        Returns:
        the constructed sorted leaderboard Map

      • getScores

        private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getScores(java.util.ArrayList<UserProfile> userScores,
                                                                           java.lang.Integer level)
        Gets the scores from users for a specific level and maps them in an unsorted leaderboard.
        Parameters:
        userScores - ArrayList - the arraylist of UserProfile instances that exist.
        level - Integer - the value of levelID for which the scores will be displayed.
        Returns:
        the unsortedLBoard, a Map instance.

      • sortScores

        private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> sortScores(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> unsortedLBoard)
        Sorts the scores in provided Map and makes a sorted map in descending order.
        Parameters:
        unsortedLBoard - Map - The unsorted Map that this method will sort
        Returns:
        a sorted leader board of type Map.
